ModMetaData.name: Zeta Reticulans
ModMetaData.author: GarbageDayIsHereToStay
ModMetaData.description:
The classic alien menace and scourge of humanity we all know and hate has finally arrived, rejoice! (There WILL be updates so stay subbed dudes)
~New~: _____________________ Added a custom fire type sound for the heat lance You'll now be able to see energy bullets at night
Existing Text Fixes/Changes (For translators mostly): _____________________ Couple new settlement names (I add so few every time it's better you don't translate these piece meal and just wait untill they build up after a few months)
Bug fixes: _____________________ Rimdevs changed the Anesthetic hediff to auto apply max severity and since i don't throughly read patch notes i'm just notcing, this change made the traq gun super OP. Fixed to the way it was before by making a new custom anesthic hediff.
